a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Prices of the five materials included in the Simon-Ehrlich wager, 1900
The change in the inflation-adjusted price of the five materials included in the wager between Julian Simon and Paul
Ehrlich in the 1980s. Simon bet that prices would fall or stay constant between 1980 and 1990; Ehrlich bet that they would
Data source: United States Geological Survey (2024). National Minerals Information Center.
Note: Prices are measured per tonne in 1998 dollars, which adjusts for inflation using the Consumer Price Index (CPI).
